Reviews.Title: “IDEAL”
Reviews.Author: ShelaghC65
Reviews.Content: booked 2 stay 810 nov 1 spectacular view popes lovely clean spacious bed pillows comfy sparkly wine arrival lovely touch ideal breakfast served whatever time couple 4 poster ideal short stay location excellent minute walk metro taxi rank round corner staff friendly angelo owner helpful etc little hotel people probably picky ive read reviews dont spend time hotel days anyway

Reviews.Title: “Good location, good staff, small rooms”
Reviews.Author: GolfIT
Reviews.Content: vatican walls location vatican city clean tiny staff service friendly 22 sq price rome looking little bit space stay

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel - just have your expectations correc”
Reviews.Author: rokopuri
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights hotel april 2011 gorgeous staff friendly gentleman day didnt speak lot english tried pretty ignorant communication lot time american travellers expectations set wrong traveling europe hotel located 3rd floor terraced building vatican city third floor elevator panic im luggage fit therewe adults carry ons wasnt flea squeeze clean actually lot roomier expecting price night plus tax bathroom larger expected shower fine husband 63 little larger bruises showering day view gorgeous location ideal roma stay

Reviews.Title: “loved it!”
Reviews.Author: KandDManchester
Reviews.Content: stayed week july 2010 weather amazing bb perfect location 2mins walk vatican museum st peters cathedral 5mins walk ottaviano metro station clean spacious staff freindly available perfect location shops restaurants niggle bath shower little otherwise adequate amazing time definitely recommend friends family overall loved
